attributes.action: free sia top up course or be able to complete online.
attributes.additional_details: because its the only way to be heard in todays society,.
attributes.background: make the top up course free or available to do online.we are one of the lowest paid industries and to find around £270 and take 3 days of work is ridicolous plus a badge top up fee of £190 ,this should be a course online for free ,we already have the ACT course online ,is this not enough

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government sets the training requirements for holding an SIA licence, but the cost of this is a matter for individual training providers, not the Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for changes to training requirements, or application and renewal fees for SIA licences, as these are set by the Government.
